properties.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 31 at 5:42AM AKST until February 2 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 50 below expected. The cold wind
chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to
exposed skin.

* WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country.

* WHEN...Midnight tonight until midnight Saturday night.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT AKST SATURDAY NIGHT
